content: 1 stitch between last co stitch and the first stitch that was on scrap yarn 14 sts k in the round for 15 rounds thumb decrease round 1 k2tog to the end of round round 2 k2tog to the last st k1 bobble the tip by drawing the tapestry needle through the remaining stitches and fastening them weaving in the end on the inside of the thumb finishing weave in the ends and enjoy all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 5 thank you very much for downloading tiilda mittens pattern i hope you will enjoy knitting them as much as i enjoyed creating them there is also a matching tiilda hat free pattern download available in my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tiilda-hat happy knitting and happy wearing ravelry inesesang instagram @isangknits email isangknits@gmail com all content © 2017 inese sang all rights reserved you may not sell copy or distribute this pattern in any format pattern support isangknits@gmail com 6
